description:
Getting straight guys to fuck is one thing — getting them to kiss is another. We’ve tried in past films to have Patrick kiss, but he always refused…until this film.
After Kenny got fucked by Bradley, he was interested in exploring things from the other side. He took his interest seriously and gave Patrick a good ride.
Both boys have that natural look that I just love. Seeing their pubes wet from all the fucking made this a fun movie to shoot!
title: Kenny Fucks Patrick
